remarks: Set of morphisms of the binary product of categories.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Jan-2017.)
statement:
xpchomfval.t $e |- T = ( C Xc. D ) $.
xpchomfval.y $e |- B = ( Base ` T ) $.
xpchomfval.h $e |- H = ( Hom ` C ) $.
xpchomfval.j $e |- J = ( Hom ` D ) $.
xpchomfval.k $e |- K = ( Hom ` T ) $.
xpchom.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
xpchom.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) $.
xpchom $p |- ( ph -> ( X K Y ) = ( ( ( 1st ` X ) H ( 1st ` Y ) ) X. ( ( 2nd ` X ) J ( 2nd ` Y ) ) ) ) $.
